data.title: Law LLB Hons - University of Bristol
data.meta_description: Law LLB Hons in University of Bristol
data.text:
Law, LLB Hons FullTime

I was unsure to begin with if I truly wanted to do law but even within the first couple of weeks of being at uni and learning the course I have loved (mostly) every second of it. There is some modules I prefer to others but in all of them my tutors and lecturers have been very good, helpful and informative ensuring I feel on track and achieving the highest of my abilities read more

Law, LLB Hons FullTime

Wide range of units for law that students could choose from, the content is very new, unique and interesting, sometime writing essays could be fun due to the content being broad and interesting. read more

Law, LLB Hons FullTime
